reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I've been to Healdsburg a few times and always like to try new properties, so selected this B&B for a 2-night stay on the advice of a friend. Overall, I was very pleased, and the only thing that prevents me from giving this place 5 stars is the bathrooms.
reviews.title: Charming B&B, solid experience
